keto_asian_beef_lettuce_wraps.description: Ground beef seasoned with ginger and sesame oil, wrapped in crisp lettuce leaves.
instructions: Sauté beef, garlic, and ginger.
Add coconut aminos and sesame oil.
Serve beef mixture in lettuce cups.

mediterranean_lemon_herb_chicken.name: Mediterranean Lemon Herb Chicken
mediterranean_lemon_herb_chicken.description: Grilled chicken marinated with lemon, oregano, and olive oil, served with a simple cucumber salad.
instructions: Marinate chicken with olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Grill or pan-sear until cooked through.
Serve with sliced cucumber seasoned with salt and pepper.

vegan_mediterranean_stuffed_peppers.name: Vegan Mediterranean Stuffed Peppers
vegan_mediterranean_stuffed_peppers.description: Colorful bell peppers stuffed with a hearty blend of quinoa, chickpeas, and vegetables.
instructions: Mix quinoa, chickpeas, tomatoes, parsley, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Stuff mixture into halved peppers.
Bake at 375°F for 30-35 minutes.

gluten_free_mediterranean_salmon.name: Gluten-Free Mediterranean Salmon
gluten_free_mediterranean_salmon.description: Baked salmon topped with olives, tomatoes, and fresh basil.
instructions: Place salmon on a baking tray, top with tomatoes, olives, basil, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Bake at 400°F for 15-18 minutes.
Serve warm.

whole30_greek_beef_bowls.name: Greek Beef Bowls
whole30_greek_beef_bowls.description: Ground beef seasoned with Mediterranean spices, served over greens with cucumber and tomato.
instructions: Cook beef with oregano, salt, and pepper.
Serve over greens with cucumber, tomatoes, and olive oil drizzle.

vegetarian_mediterranean_quinoa_bowl.name: Vegetarian Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
vegetarian_mediterranean_quinoa_bowl.description: Protein-rich quinoa bowl topped with roasted veggies and hummus.
instructions: Arrange quinoa, roasted veggies, and hummus in bowls.
Drizzle with olive oil, season with salt and pepper, and serve.

paleo_mediterranean_lamb_chops.name: Paleo Mediterranean Lamb Chops
paleo_mediterranean_lamb_chops.description: Grilled lamb chops seasoned with rosemary, garlic, and lemon zest.
instructions: Rub lamb chops with olive oil, garlic, rosemary, lemon zest, salt, and pepper.
Grill or pan-sear 3-4 minutes per side.
Rest briefly before serving.

keto_mediterranean_shrimp_scampi.name: Keto Mediterranean Shrimp Scampi
keto_mediterranean_shrimp_scampi.description: Shrimp sautéed in garlic butter with lemon and herbs, served over sautéed spinach.
instructions: Sauté garlic in butter.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Add lemon juice, oregano, and sautéed spinach.

mediterranean_hawaiian_grilled_mahi.name: Mediterranean-Style Grilled Mahi Mahi
mediterranean_hawaiian_grilled_mahi.description: Grilled mahi mahi fillets brushed with olive oil, lemon, and oregano for a Hawaiian-Mediterranean twist.
instructions: Brush fillets with olive oil, lemon, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Grill over medium heat for 3-4 minutes per side until cooked through.
Serve warm.

vegan_hawaiian_bbq_tofu.name: Vegan Hawaiian BBQ Tofu
vegan_hawaiian_bbq_tofu.description: Grilled tofu steaks basted in a tropical pineapple BBQ sauce.
instructions: Press and slice tofu into thick steaks.
Whisk pineapple juice, tomato paste, soy sauce, maple syrup, and garlic powder.
Grill tofu, basting with sauce, until charred.
Serve hot.

gluten_free_hawaiian_garlic_shrimp.name: Gluten-Free Hawaiian Garlic Shrimp
gluten_free_hawaiian_garlic_shrimp.description: Famous North Shore-style shrimp sautéed in garlic butter.
instructions: Melt butter and olive oil in a skillet.
Add garlic and shrimp.
Sauté until shrimp are pink and cooked through.
Serve with lemon wedges.

whole30_kalua_pork_bowl.name: Kalua Pork Bowl
whole30_kalua_pork_bowl.description: Tender slow-cooked pork seasoned simply with sea salt and smoked flavor, served over cabbage.
instructions: Rub pork with salt and liquid smoke.
Cook on low for 6 hours in a slow cooker.
Shred and serve over cabbage.

vegetarian_hawaiian_pineapple_fried_rice.name: Vegetarian Hawaiian Pineapple Fried Rice
vegetarian_hawaiian_pineapple_fried_rice.description: Sweet and savory pineapple fried rice with colorful vegetables.
instructions: Heat olive oil and sauté peppers and green onions.
Add rice and soy sauce, stirring well.
Fold in pineapple chunks and serve.

paleo_hawaiian_grilled_chicken_thighs.name: Paleo Hawaiian Grilled Chicken Thighs
paleo_hawaiian_grilled_chicken_thighs.description: Chicken thighs marinated in pineapple juice and coconut aminos, grilled to juicy perfection.
instructions: Marinate chicken in pineapple juice, coconut aminos, salt, and pepper.
Grill over medium-high heat for 5-6 minutes per side.
Serve hot.

keto_hawaiian_beef_skewers.name: Keto Hawaiian Beef Skewers
keto_hawaiian_beef_skewers.description: Beef skewers marinated in a sugar-free soy-pineapple glaze and grilled to juicy perfection.
instructions: Toss beef cubes with marinade ingredients.
Thread onto skewers.
Grill over high heat for 2-3 minutes per side.
Serve hot with lime wedges.

mediterranean_almond_fig_bites.name: Mediterranean Almond Fig Bites
mediterranean_almond_fig_bites.description: Sweet dried figs stuffed with almonds and drizzled with honey for a Mediterranean-style snack.
instructions: Slice figs and insert an almond into each.
Drizzle with honey before serving.

vegan_energy_balls.name: Vegan Energy Balls
vegan_energy_balls.description: No-bake energy balls made with oats, peanut butter, and maple syrup.
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Roll into balls and refrigerate for 30 minutes.

gluten_free_yogurt_fruit_cups.name: Gluten-Free Yogurt Fruit Cups
gluten_free_yogurt_fruit_cups.description: Layered Greek yogurt and mixed berries for a refreshing gluten-free snack.
instructions: Spoon yogurt into cups.
Top with berries and drizzle with honey.

whole30_celery_cashew_snacks.name: Celery Cashew Snacks
whole30_celery_cashew_snacks.description: Simple crunchy celery sticks filled with creamy cashew butter.
instructions: Fill celery sticks with cashew butter.
Serve immediately.

vegetarian_cheddar_popcorn.name: Vegetarian Cheddar Popcorn
vegetarian_cheddar_popcorn.description: Freshly popped popcorn tossed with cheddar cheese seasoning.
instructions: Pop popcorn in olive oil.
Toss with powdered cheddar cheese while warm.

paleo_beef_jerky_bites.name: Paleo Beef Jerky Bites
paleo_beef_jerky_bites.description: Savory, protein-packed beef jerky pieces ideal for snacking.
instructions: Portion jerky into bite-sized servings.
Enjoy on the go.

keto_cheddar_avocado_rollups.name: Keto Cheddar Avocado Roll-Ups
keto_cheddar_avocado_rollups.description: Cheddar slices rolled with avocado slices for a creamy, satisfying keto snack.
instructions: Place avocado slices on cheddar slices.
Roll up tightly and serve.

mediterranean_tomato_bruschetta.name: Mediterranean Tomato Bruschetta
mediterranean_tomato_bruschetta.description: Classic bruschetta with fresh tomatoes, basil, and olive oil on toasted bread.
instructions: Toast bread slices until golden.
Mix tomatoes, olive oil, basil, salt, and pepper.
Spoon tomato mixture onto toasted bread and serve.

vegan_olive_tapenade.name: Vegan Olive Tapenade
vegan_olive_tapenade.description: Savory vegan tapenade made with green and black olives, capers, and garlic.
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a food processor until chunky.
Serve with crackers or veggie sticks.

gluten_free_caprese_skewers.name: Gluten-Free Caprese Skewers
gluten_free_caprese_skewers.description: Mini skewers layered with mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, and basil.
instructions: Thread mozzarella, tomato, and basil onto toothpicks.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper.

whole30_prosciutto_melon_bites.name: Prosciutto Melon Bites
whole30_prosciutto_melon_bites.description: Sweet melon cubes wrapped in savory prosciutto slices.
instructions: Wrap each melon cube with a piece of prosciutto.
Secure with a toothpick and serve.

vegetarian_ricotta_toast.name: Vegetarian Ricotta Toast
vegetarian_ricotta_toast.description: Creamy ricotta cheese spread over toast and topped with honey.
instructions: Toast bread slices.
Spread ricotta over each slice.
Drizzle with honey and sprinkle pistachios if desired.

paleo_antipasto_cups.name: Paleo Antipasto Cups
paleo_antipasto_cups.description: Mini cups filled with artichokes, olives, and salami slices.
instructions: Line muffin tins with salami slices.
Fill with artichokes and olives.
Chill before serving.

keto_mozzarella_stick_bites.name: Keto Mozzarella Stick Bites
keto_mozzarella_stick_bites.description: Baked low-carb mozzarella sticks with almond flour coating.
instructions: Dip mozzarella sticks in egg, then coat in almond flour seasoned with Italian herbs.
Bake at 400°F for 8-10 minutes until golden.

mediterranean_mexican_cucumber_salad.name: Mediterranean Mexican Cucumber Salad
mediterranean_mexican_cucumber_salad.description: Fresh cucumber slices tossed with lime, olive oil, and a sprinkle of chili powder for a Mediterranean-Mexican fusion snack.
instructions: Toss cucumber slices with olive oil, lime juice, chili powder, and salt.
Serve chilled.

vegan_street_corn_salad.name: Vegan Street Corn Salad
vegan_street_corn_salad.description: A dairy-free twist on Mexican street corn with vegan mayo, lime, and chili powder.
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Chill for 10 minutes before serving.

gluten_free_mini_tostadas.name: Gluten-Free Mini Tostadas
gluten_free_mini_tostadas.description: Crunchy mini corn tostadas topped with refried beans, salsa, and avocado.
instructions: Bake tortillas at 375°F until crisp.
Top with beans, salsa, and avocado slices.

whole30_shrimp_cevice_cups.name: Shrimp Ceviche Cups
whole30_shrimp_cevice_cups.description: Zesty shrimp ceviche served in crisp lettuce cups for a refreshing snack.
instructions: Mix shrimp, onion, cucumber, lime juice, and cilantro.
Spoon into lettuce cups and serve.

vegetarian_black_bean_dip.name: Vegetarian Black Bean Dip
vegetarian_black_bean_dip.description: Smooth black bean dip seasoned with cumin and lime, served with tortilla chips.
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Serve with tortilla chips or veggies.

paleo_guacamole_cups.name: Paleo Guacamole Cups
paleo_guacamole_cups.description: Fresh homemade guacamole scooped into cucumber slices.
instructions: Mix avocado, onion, and lime juice.
Spoon guacamole onto cucumber rounds.

keto_cheese_taco_shells.name: Keto Cheese Taco Shells
keto_cheese_taco_shells.description: Crispy baked cheddar cheese shells folded into mini taco shapes.
instructions: Make small piles of cheese on a baking sheet.
Bake at 375°F until melted and bubbly.
While warm, fold over a spoon handle to create a taco shell shape.

mediterranean_asian_cucumber_salad.name: Mediterranean Asian Cucumber Salad
mediterranean_asian_cucumber_salad.description: A refreshing fusion salad with crunchy cucumbers, sesame oil, and rice vinegar.
instructions: Toss cucumbers with sesame oil, rice vinegar, and soy sauce.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and chill before serving.

vegan_edamame_hummus.name: Vegan Edamame Hummus
vegan_edamame_hummus.description: A creamy, protein-packed hummus made with edamame and tahini.
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Serve with veggie sticks or crackers.

gluten_free_sushi_bites.name: Gluten-Free Sushi Bites
gluten_free_sushi_bites.description: Mini rice bites topped with avocado, cucumber, and sesame seeds.
instructions: Mix rice with rice vinegar.
Form small rice balls or discs.
Top with avocado and cucumber, sprinkle sesame seeds.

whole30_ahi_tuna_salad.name: Ahi Tuna Salad Cups
whole30_ahi_tuna_salad.description: Fresh ahi tuna diced and served in lettuce cups with avocado and lime.
instructions: Mix tuna, avocado, and lime juice.
Spoon into lettuce leaves and season with salt and pepper.

vegetarian_miso_soup_cups.name: Vegetarian Miso Soup Cups
vegetarian_miso_soup_cups.description: Mini servings of comforting vegetarian miso soup packed with tofu and seaweed.
instructions: Warm broth and dissolve miso paste.
Add tofu, seaweed, and green onion.
Simmer gently and serve in small cups.

paleo_chicken_lettuce_wraps.name: Paleo Chicken Lettuce Wraps
paleo_chicken_lettuce_wraps.description: Ground chicken stir-fried with veggies and spices, served in lettuce leaves.
instructions: Cook chicken with bell peppers and mushrooms.
Stir in coconut aminos.
Serve in lettuce cups.

keto_coconut_crusted_shrimp.name: Keto Coconut Crusted Shrimp
keto_coconut_crusted_shrimp.description: Juicy shrimp coated in shredded coconut and almond flour, then baked until golden.
instructions: Dip shrimp in egg, then coat with coconut and almond flour.
Bake at 400°F for 10-12 minutes until crispy.

mediterranean_hummus_plate.name: Classic Hummus Plate
mediterranean_hummus_plate.description: Creamy hummus served with sliced cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, and olives.
instructions: Arrange hummus, cucumber slices, tomatoes, and olives on a platter.
Serve immediately.

vegan_stuffed_grape_leaves.name: Vegan Stuffed Grape Leaves
vegan_stuffed_grape_leaves.description: Tender grape leaves filled with seasoned rice and fresh herbs.
instructions: Mix rice with lemon juice, parsley, and mint.
Place a spoonful on each grape leaf and roll tightly.
Chill before serving.

gluten_free_baba_ganoush.name: Gluten-Free Baba Ganoush
gluten_free_baba_ganoush.description: Smoky roasted eggplant blended with tahini, lemon, and garlic.
instructions: Roast eggplant at 400°F until soft (about 30 minutes).
Scoop out flesh and blend with tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil.
Serve with veggies.

whole30_tomato_olive_tapas.name: Tomato and Olive Tapas
whole30_tomato_olive_tapas.description: Juicy tomatoes and briny olives drizzled with olive oil and fresh herbs.
instructions: Mix tomatoes, olives, olive oil, and parsley in a bowl.
Serve immediately or chill.

vegetarian_feta_cucumber_bites.name: Vegetarian Feta Cucumber Bites
vegetarian_feta_cucumber_bites.description: Fresh cucumber rounds topped with creamy feta and a sprinkle of herbs.
instructions: Top each cucumber slice with feta and dill.
Serve immediately.

paleo_zaatar_chicken_skewers.name: Paleo Zaatar Chicken Skewers
paleo_zaatar_chicken_skewers.description: Tender grilled chicken skewers seasoned with Middle Eastern za'atar spice blend.
instructions: Toss chicken cubes with za'atar, olive oil, and salt.
Thread onto skewers and grill until cooked through.

keto_stuffed_peppadews.name: Keto Stuffed Peppadews
keto_stuffed_peppadews.description: Sweet peppadew peppers stuffed with creamy goat cheese.
instructions: Fill each pepper with goat cheese.
Serve immediately or chill.

mediterranean_hawaiian_poke_bowl.name: Mediterranean-Inspired Poke Bowl
mediterranean_hawaiian_poke_bowl.description: Fresh poke bowl with ahi tuna, olives, cucumber, and a lemon-olive oil dressing.
instructions: Toss tuna, cucumber, and olives with olive oil and lemon juice.
Serve chilled.

vegan_hawaiian_fruit_salad.name: Vegan Hawaiian Fruit Salad
vegan_hawaiian_fruit_salad.description: A tropical medley of pineapple, mango, and banana tossed with lime.
instructions: Combine all fruit in a bowl.
Drizzle with lime juice and toss gently.

gluten_free_hawaiian_spam_bites.name: Gluten-Free Spam Musubi Bites
gluten_free_hawaiian_spam_bites.description: Mini musubi bites with seasoned rice and Spam wrapped in nori.
instructions: Fry Spam slices and brush with soy sauce.
Shape rice into small blocks, top with Spam, and wrap with nori strips.

whole30_hawaiian_shrimp_skewers.name: Hawaiian Shrimp Skewers
whole30_hawaiian_shrimp_skewers.description: Juicy shrimp skewers grilled with pineapple and brushed with lime.
instructions: Thread shrimp and pineapple onto skewers.
Grill and brush with lime juice, season with salt and pepper.

vegetarian_coconut_mochi.name: Vegetarian Coconut Mochi Squares
vegetarian_coconut_mochi.description: Chewy, lightly sweet coconut-flavored mochi squares.
instructions: Mix all ingredients into a batter.
Pour into a greased baking pan and bake at 350°F for 25-30 minutes.
Cool and cut into squares.

paleo_hawaiian_chicken_bites.name: Paleo Hawaiian Chicken Bites
paleo_hawaiian_chicken_bites.description: Savory chicken bites glazed with pineapple juice and coconut aminos.
instructions: Cook chicken cubes until golden.
Add pineapple juice and coconut aminos, simmer to glaze.

keto_macadamia_poke_bites.name: Keto Macadamia Poke Bites
keto_macadamia_poke_bites.description: Ahi tuna bites mixed with chopped macadamia nuts and avocado.
instructions: Gently mix tuna, macadamia nuts, and avocado.
Chill briefly and serve.
